Very good story and very fun co-op a strong 10/10.

God damn this game is good. The humor is amazing while not undercutting serious tones, the level design is absolutely phenomenal, the world building is wonderful, this game is so good I'm running out of ways to describe it. if you have ANY interest in games this is a must-have.

This game is no doubt one of the best games, period. you may not be into puzzle games, and neither was I, but this game is still one of the best gaming experiences even after over a decade since it's release, this is a great example of how good valve is at making video games, yet they still don't make any.

Sidenotes:
-I found the final boss to be more interesting and harder than the first game which is good because the final boss last game was way too easy.
-The underground old aperture labs section was probably my least favorite part, and it alone is better than most games I've played before
-I found my experience was much better when I didn't look up things to figure out stuff and instead just figured it out by myself.
Best game I've ever played. Love the Portal franchise, only if Valve could've counted to 3.
A great puzzle game with a funny character that has a great twist at the begining and a potato and a must have for puzzle game fans
My kink with robots have substantially increased, thanks Valve.
this is a good game if its on sale

This is the pinnacle of all story games. The conflict between wheatley, chell, and GLaDOS is so crazy. The puzzles make you feel like you're stumped, but right after they give you that "aha!" moment. A lot of people don't think this game is re-playable, but thats not nessisarily true. This is one of my favorite games of all time, and im sure it will be yours too.
Amazing game to play with friends

Though this game is 10 years old, I still find out more and more about the game and things to do in it. At first you play the game for the singleplayer puzzles then when you get bored you find out there is a co-op so you have fun with other people. Then once you memorize all of the co-op puzzles you can show new players the ropes to becoming good at the game. After this most people quit because they get bored and have nothing else to do, however a small amount of players will attempt to learn how to speedrun which opens up a ton of new ways to play in both singleplayer and co-op. Part of the reason why I love this game so much is the fact that it being 10 years old opens up a ton of new things to do in the game such as learning new glitches and tricks or getting a faster time or even just finding other people who enjoy the speedrunning aswell and becoming friends. All of these things to do in such an old source game is why this game is in my top 5 games of all time list. I know this review is kind of late for this game but if you are just seeing this I hope this convinces you to buy the game or if you already have it, to try speedrunning and glitch hunting as that is an entire nother world of fun to be had in a game that most people are bored of by now.
verry good game and u will be joed mamam
